question: Which Indian sportsperson will represent IOC's Athletes’ Commission (AC) in the Badminton World Federation (BWF)
explanation: Ace Indian badminton player, Saina Nehwal will represent International Olympic Committee’s Athletes’ Commission (IOC AC) in the Badminton World Federation (BWF). She will join the BWF Athletes’ Commission as a representative of the IOC AC. It’s a rare honour for an Indian sportsperson. Before this, she was appointed a member of the IOC Athletes\' Commission (AC) in 2016.
